TopicTitle: Collect 450 ore from Minimus, won't complete

Articles.Content:
"Acquire 450 fresh ore from Minimus"

So I did, I put a refueling station on Minimus with the capacity for 900 ore, started extracting, got to 455 ore and it still doesn't complete.

Is there any workaround for this bug?

Edit- this automatically solved itself when I collected another 450 ore. No idea why the first batch didn't count.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-24T14:36:12Z" title="05/24/2015 02:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 24, 2015</time> by Mastikator**
  
solved itself

Is that the whole mission? I just did the same mission with 400ore and it got completed fine. Are you sure that you don't need to bring the ore back to kerbin and just extract it? If yes try jettisoning the ore tank and refill it.

Hello,

I'm the second one with similar problem: *1000 fresh ore from Mun*. Now I have 1004 in my ore containers and mission is still not completed. However, I've been receiving mid-stage mission info: 25% ore harvested..., 50%..., 75%... Thats odd. A bug maybe?
I find it takes 2-3 minutes sitting there for it to complete after collection
